personal.name: Mwafaq N. Abu-Shanab
personal.title: AI-Powered Business Consultant & Million-Dollar Company Builder
personal.tagline: Building the next generation of million-dollar AI companies. The future belongs to intelligent startups.
personal.bio:
I help ambitious entrepreneurs build million-dollar AI companies in the era where intelligence beats scale. The future isn't about billion-dollar giants—it's about thousands of agile, AI-powered companies worth $1M+ each.

With MA Loom, I guide founders through AI integration, intelligent automation, and scalable workflows that turn ideas into profitable ventures. From concept to $1M+ valuation, I provide the coaching, training, and strategic guidance that transforms startups into AI-native success stories.

Beyond building companies, I'm a proud father of four (including triplets!) and fluent in multiple languages, helping me connect with diverse entrepreneurs worldwide.

testimonials.name: Sarah Chen
testimonials.title: CTO, TechFlow Solutions
testimonials.content: MA Loom transformed our chaotic development process into a well-oiled machine. We went from 6-week sprints to 2-week deliveries with 40% fewer bugs. The automation workflows they built saved us 15 hours per week.

testimonials.name: Michael Rodriguez
testimonials.title: Operations Director, Global Manufacturing Inc
testimonials.content: The workflow optimization and agile transformation delivered immediate results. Our time-to-market improved by 50%, and team satisfaction scores increased dramatically. Mwafaq's approach is both practical and transformative.

testimonials.name: Dr. Priya Patel
testimonials.title: Chief Innovation Officer, HealthTech Solutions
testimonials.content: Working with MA Loom was a game-changer for our product development. The LoomMap workshops identified bottlenecks we didn't even know existed. Now we ship features that actually solve real problems.
testimonials.results: 3x improvement in feature adoption, 60% faster releases
